name: Simple BINGO Caller
description:
Want to play BINGO? Don't have some one to call the numbers? Let Simple BINGO Caller do it for you!

Tap the button with the asterisk and a ball will be called.
Tap the gear button to bring up preferences and turn on the system voice for calling the ball out loud (when your device is not muted).
Tap the button with an "R" on it to clear the numbers called and start a new game.
Tap the Blank button to bring up the BINGO Board on the phone and scroll through all the called numbers.
Connect your iOS device to an external monitor and you will see a big BINGO Board for large display, such as to a room of players.

Please remember, Simple BINGO Caller does not provide anything other than a Caller, you as the user must provide the BINGO Cards and daubers.
